pullRequest.body:
`Polynomial` and `MvPolynomial` are algebraic objects, hence should be under `Algebra` (or at least not under `Data`)


---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body: ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by Ruben-VandeVelde.

I trust all the import changes went well, and all the non-import changes also look good to me:

```
git diff -U0 $(git merge-base origin/master HEAD) | rg '^[+-]' | rg -v '^(\+\+\+|---)' | rg -v '^[+-]import Mathlib.(Data|Algebra).(Mv)?Polynomial'
-import Mathlib.Algebra.MonoidAlgebra.Degree
+import Mathlib.Algebra.MonoidAlgebra.Degree
+import Mathlib.Algebra.BigOperators.Fin
-import Mathlib.Algebra.BigOperators.Fin
-import Mathlib.Algebra.Order.EuclideanAbsoluteValue
+import Mathlib.Algebra.Order.EuclideanAbsoluteValue
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.Localization.FractionRing
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.Localization.FractionRing
-`Mathlib.Data.Polynomial.Div` After some discussion on [Zulip]
+`Mathlib.Algebra.Polynomial.Div` After some discussion on [Zulip]
-is a generalization of `Data.Polynomial.Eval`.
+is a generalization of `Algebra.Polynomial.Eval`.
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.Algebraic
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.Algebraic
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.AlgebraicIndependent
-import Mathlib.FieldTheory.IsAlgClosed.Basic
+import Mathlib.FieldTheory.IsAlgClosed.Basic
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.AlgebraicIndependent
-import Mathlib.NumberTheory.ClassNumber.AdmissibleAbsoluteValue
+import Mathlib.NumberTheory.ClassNumber.AdmissibleAbsoluteValue
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.Adjoin.Basic
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.MvPolynomial.Basic
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.Adjoin.Basic
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.MvPolynomial.Basic
+-- See Mathlib.Algebra.MvPolynomial.Monad for join and bind operations
-See `Mathlib.Data.Polynomial.Module` for more discussion on this problem. -/
+See `Mathlib.Algebra.Polynomial.Module` for more discussion on this problem. -/
-import Mathlib.GroupTheory.SpecificGroups.Cyclic
+import Mathlib.GroupTheory.SpecificGroups.Cyclic
+import Mathlib.Algebra.GroupWithZero.NonZeroDivisors
-import Mathlib.Algebra.GroupWithZero.NonZeroDivisors
+import Mathlib.Data.Finset.PiAntidiagonal
-import Mathlib.Data.Finset.PiAntidiagonal
-# Ring-theoretic supplement of Data.Polynomial.
+# Ring-theoretic supplement of Algebra.Polynomial.
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.Polynomial.Pochhammer
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.Polynomial.Pochhammer
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.Nilpotent
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.Nilpotent
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.MatrixAlgebra
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.MatrixAlgebra
-
-import Mathlib.RingTheory.Polynomial.Vieta
+import Mathlib.RingTheory.Polynomial.Vieta
-Mathlib/Data/MvPolynomial/Basic.lean : line 1 : ERR_NUM_LIN : 1900 file contains 1705 lines, try to split it up
+Mathlib/Algebra/MvPolynomial/Basic.lean : line 1 : ERR_NUM_LIN : 1900 file contains 1705 lines, try to split it up
-Mathlib/Data/Polynomial/Degree/Definitions.lean : line 1 : ERR_NUM_LIN : 1800 file contains 1689 lines, try to split it up
-Mathlib/Data/Polynomial/RingDivision.lean : line 1 : ERR_NUM_LIN : 1700 file contains 1569 lines, try to split it up
+Mathlib/Algebra/Polynomial/Degree/Definitions.lean : line 1 : ERR_NUM_LIN : 1800 file contains 1689 lines, try to split it up
+Mathlib/Algebra/Polynomial/RingDivision.lean : line 1 : ERR_NUM_LIN : 1700 file contains 1569 lines, try to split it up
+-- All rewrite-only lemmas from `Mathlib.Algebra.Polynomial.Degree.Definitions`,
```

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8568063565/job/23481158539)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8568063565/job/23481158077)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8568063565/job/23481158334)
I agree with this change. `Polynomial` and `MvPolynomial` depend fundamentally on algebraic typeclasses, it feels like they are different from the rest of `/Data`.
I agree with this change. `Polynomial` and `MvPolynomial` depend fundamentally on algebraic typeclasses, it feels like they are different from the rest of `/Data`.

**[imports]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - move(Polynomial): Move out of `Data`

source.title: Carve out Algebra, Data and Order sublibraries

nodes.body: I agree with this change. `Polynomial` and `MvPolynomial` depend fundamentally on algebraic typeclasses, it feels like they are different from the rest of `/Data`.
